Thanks. So I know I am not alone. It seemed to subside today.Last night I almost called the ambulance. My husband was at school. With the itching the night before, last night around 7:30 I thought I was having a heart attack. Didn't know what it was--anxiety (but wasn't nervously thinking about anything), heartburn or my heart. So I covered all my bases--popped an ativan, took two tums and after about 20 minutes it went away. My whole chest hurt and my back also. I guess I better tell the doctor just in case. But I think it was heartburn from eating too fast. Scarry though.

Yes I have the same problem.
